skins.selfIntroduction: I'm a battlecruiser... eh? Now that I mention it, am I no longer a warship? Hm, never mind. I am Akagi, and that's all that matters. Hehe. You must feel so honored to be my slave, hmm?
skins.acquisition: So you're the best this fleet has to offer? Well then, to please Amagi I'm going to have to start by dominating you. Hehehe.... How blessed you are. From this day forward, you're Akagi's number one slave.
skins.login: If you sneak off without telling me one more time, I might just have to turn this place into a sea of fire.
skins.details: It's truly marvelous to be so loved and treasured by this slave. *giggle*
skins.secretaryIdle1: With Amagi at my side, there is nothing we cannot do~ You are blessed indeed, my number one slave.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Your profile is quite striking when you're working so diligently. Truly worthy of being my slave!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Slave, while I don't mind you playing with your underlings, you must never forget to whom you answer.
skins.secretaryTouch: Aren't you a clingy slave. Very well, I'll play with you~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *giggle* Seems I'll have to shackle you...
